languages.text: "Знаешь, шерин, я, быть может, до сих пор бы где-то от мира к миру шаталась на усталых кораблях с продажными вояками. Если бы не захотела жизни лучшей, чем у меня была. Приняла однажды у Касбаллики груз, кхм, веществ всяческих. Ну там... для плотских утех и прочее. Какая-то шишка себе захотела, видишь ли, на пятый десяток службы праздник устроить".

traits.locale_text: "Знаешь, шерин, я, быть может, до сих пор бы где-то от мира к миру шаталась на усталых кораблях с продажными вояками. Если бы не захотела жизни лучшей, чем у меня была. Приняла однажды у Касбаллики груз, кхм, веществ всяческих. Ну там... для плотских утех и прочее. Какая-то шишка себе захотела, видишь ли, на пятый десяток службы праздник устроить".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, шерин, я, быть может, до сих пор бы где-то от мира к миру шаталась на усталых кораблях с продажными вояками. Если бы не захотела жизни лучшей, чем у меня была. Приняла однажды у Касбаллики груз, кхм, веществ всяческих. Ну там... для плотских утех и прочее. Какая-то шишка себе захотела, видишь ли, на пятый десяток службы праздник устроить".

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, I still could have been wandering from one world to another on tired old ships with venal grunts had I not yearned for a better life. I once accepted a cargo of certain... chemicals... from the Kasballica. You know, for carnal pleasures and such. Some bigwig wanted to throw a party to celebrate their fifth decade in the service."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, I still could have been wandering from one world to another on tired old ships with venal grunts had I not yearned for a better life. I once accepted a cargo of certain... chemicals... from the Kasballica. You know, for carnal pleasures and such. Some bigwig wanted to throw a party to celebrate their fifth decade in the service."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你知道吗，亲爱的？如果我没有下定决心改善我的生活，我现在可能还窝在吱吱嘎嘎的旧船上，与令人厌恶的嘟囔声为伴，从一个世界颠簸到另一个世界。我曾经负责接收过卡斯巴利卡运来的一批……化学品，用来享受肉体欢愉或者类似的东西，你懂的。当时有个大人物，他为了庆祝服役五十周年，举办了一场派对。”
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: “你知道吗，亲爱的？如果我没有下定决心改善我的生活，我现在可能还窝在吱吱嘎嘎的旧船上，与令人厌恶的嘟囔声为伴，从一个世界颠簸到另一个世界。我曾经负责接收过卡斯巴利卡运来的一批……化学品，用来享受肉体欢愉或者类似的东西，你懂的。当时有个大人物，他为了庆祝服役五十周年，举办了一场派对。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

languages.text: «¿Sabe, shereen? Podría seguir saltando de mundo en mundo, agazapada en naves viejas con matones contratados como única compañía, de no haber decidido que quería que mi vida fuera algo más. Acepté un envío de la Kasballica que contenía ciertos... químicos. Ya sabes, para satisfacer placeres carnales y esas cosas. Un magnate estaba preparando una fiesta para celebrar su quinta década de servicio».
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe, shereen? Podría seguir saltando de mundo en mundo, agazapada en naves viejas con matones contratados como única compañía, de no haber decidido que quería que mi vida fuera algo más. Acepté un envío de la Kasballica que contenía ciertos... químicos. Ya sabes, para satisfacer placeres carnales y esas cosas. Un magnate estaba preparando una fiesta para celebrar su quinta década de servicio».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ねえ、あたしは今も世界を転々としていたのかもしれない。もしあたしが、自分の人生にもっと多くのものを求めると決断していなかったら、古ぼけた船で口さがない連中と一緒に引きこもっていただろうね。あたしはカスバリカからある荷物…化学薬品を引き受けた。まあ、肉欲を満たすためのモノさ。どこかのお偉いさんが、現役50年目を祝うパーティーを開いていた」
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: 「ねえ、あたしは今も世界を転々としていたのかもしれない。もしあたしが、自分の人生にもっと多くのものを求めると決断していなかったら、古ぼけた船で口さがない連中と一緒に引きこもっていただろうね。あたしはカスバリカからある荷物…化学薬品を引き受けた。まあ、肉欲を満たすためのモノさ。どこかのお偉いさんが、現役50年目を祝うパーティーを開いていた」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, Shereen, ich könnte noch immer von einer Welt zur anderen hüpfen, auf klapprigen alten Schiffen, zusammengepfercht mit käuflichen Soldaten. Aber ich habe entschieden, dass ich mehr vom Leben will. Ich habe eine Lieferung der Kasballica angenommen, eine Lieferung gewisser ... Chemikalien. Ihr wisst schon, für fleischliche Vergnügungen und dergleichen. Irgendein hohes Tier hat eine Party gegeben, um sein fünftes Jahrzehnt im Dienst zu feiern."
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, Shereen, ich könnte noch immer von einer Welt zur anderen hüpfen, auf klapprigen alten Schiffen, zusammengepfercht mit käuflichen Soldaten. Aber ich habe entschieden, dass ich mehr vom Leben will. Ich habe eine Lieferung der Kasballica angenommen, eine Lieferung gewisser ... Chemikalien. Ihr wisst schon, für fleischliche Vergnügungen und dergleichen. Irgendein hohes Tier hat eine Party gegeben, um sein fünftes Jahrzehnt im Dienst zu feiern."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez, shereen, je pourrais toujours être baladée d'un monde à l'autre à bord de vaisseaux décrépis avec des troufions vénaux pour seule compagnie, si je n'avais pas décidé que je méritais mieux que ça. J'ai accepté de faire une livraison pour la Kasballica, une cargaison de... substances chimiques. Pour les plaisirs charnels et ce genre de choses, vous voyez. Un gros bonnet organisait une fête pour célébrer ses cinquante ans de service. »
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, shereen, je pourrais toujours être baladée d'un monde à l'autre à bord de vaisseaux décrépis avec des troufions vénaux pour seule compagnie, si je n'avais pas décidé que je méritais mieux que ça. J'ai accepté de faire une livraison pour la Kasballica, une cargaison de... substances chimiques. Pour les plaisirs charnels et ce genre de choses, vous voyez. Un gros bonnet organisait une fête pour célébrer ses cinquante ans de service. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Biliyor musun şirinim? Hayattan daha fazlasını istediğime karar vermemiş olsaydım hâlâ dünyadan dünyaya atlıyor, külüstür gemilerde rüşvetçilerle seyahat ediyor olabilirdim. Kasballica'dan belli bir... Kimyasal içeren bir sevkiyatı kabul ettim. Bu kimyasal, dünyevi zevkler için kullanılıyormuş. Kodamanın biri hizmetteki ellinci yılı için mi ne parti verecekti."
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, I could still be bouncing around from one world to another, holed up on tired old ships with only venal grunts for company, if I hadn't decided I wanted more for my life. I accepted a shipment from the Kasballica of certain... chemicals. You know, for carnal pleasures and the like. Some bigwig was throwing a party to celebrate his fifth decade in the service."

traits.locale_text: "Biliyor musun şirinim? Hayattan daha fazlasını istediğime karar vermemiş olsaydım hâlâ dünyadan dünyaya atlıyor, külüstür gemilerde rüşvet meraklısı ezikler eşliğinde dolaşıyor olabilirdim. Kasballica'dan gelen, belli bir... Kimyasal türü içeren bir sevkiyatı kabul ettim. Dünyevi zevkler falan için işte. Kodamanın biri hizmetteki ellinci yılı için mi ne bir parti verecekti."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
